backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profile storage and admin-restricted product CRUD with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind stylesheet defining custom design system variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document bootstrapping the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application entry component configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping the app with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing shared navigation, main content area, and footer across pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing branding, dynamic year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx: Navigation bar handling authentication, admin link visibility, user profile display, and profile setup prompts.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: React form component for creating or editing products with validation and submit handling.
Displays a table of products with loading/empty states and an edit action.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for first-time users to enter and save their profile name with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the current authenticated user is an admin using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout methods, and loads persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles and product CRUD operations via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, and identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: UI page shown when a user lacks required permissions, with explanation and navigation back home.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that checks admin status, lists products, and provides forms to create or edit products with navigation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page showing feature cards and navigation options based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, pending requests, known issues, and current state of the Ocarina Store Admin app.
